thread.section_title: Life Style Sports Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Life Style Sports | lifestylesports.com
thread.title: Tara Dolan
thread.title_full: Life Style Sports reviewed by Tara Dolan

author: Tara Dolan
title: Tara Dolan
text: Was in your Letterkenny branch as my daughter wanted a pair of addidas superstars for her birthday party. Unfortunately there were none in her size but the lady working that day (never got her name) was so friendly & helpful. She checked online to see what was available in my daughters size & we were able to order a pair for next day delivery to the shop. The customer service was amazing & my daughter was delighted. We will definitely be making lifestyle our first choice in the future.
